name: Stuntz! [A Scrolling Platformer] (KrazyKernel)
description:
~Stuntz! A Scrolling Platformer~

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

      ~About Game~

~Venture through the city, but avoid the red spikes that lie up ahead! Can you beat the game? Note: Be sure to click the game screen before playing so it can start!!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    ~Controls~

~A/D or LEFT/RIGHT Arrow keys to move around
~W or UP Arrow key to jump

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

         ~Credits & Links~    

~Music: Masked Heroes by Vexento
~All art and code made by me in Scratch!
~You can learn more about me here!: https://resite.link/KrazyKernel

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    ~Bonus~

~All levels are possible, I tested out the game and made the levels hard but after 3 or so tries you'll get there!
~Here's a little tip for beating the game: Take your time on ALL of the levels, if you try to rush then you'll get mad VERY quick and end up rage-quitting. Don't rage quit lol.
~This game took me about 4 days to make.  I'm currently learning how to make more advanced Scratch games so I can end up mastering Scratch and make bigger projects! 
~Feedback would be much appreciated in the comments! Also, if you like the game or games I make don't forget to follow me to stay updated! Peace!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
